intro.title: Hej, I'm Joel Sand√©n
intro.description: I'm a father of two from beautiful Falkenberg, Sweden. Currently at Nordic Morning Nordics as a Technology Advisor and Lead Frontend Dev. My focus is headless applications and systems that can deliver high quality code over time (I obviously love Typescript and strict linting rules)

intro.title: Previously
intro.description: I have a long history within digital. I once founded a computer museum, I've done well over 300 lectures on digital transformation, worked as a Creative Director and much more. However, the last couple of years has been focused on doing front end development and CD/CI tooling.

experiences.title: Senior Frontend Developer & Technology Advisor
experiences.description: At Nordic Morning I develop for clients such as SCA, Vattenfall, Diageo, Folkh√§lsomyndigheten and Combitech. Apart from coding I also help with a11y reviews, code reviews and more.

experiences.title: Product Owner / Senior React Developer
experiences.description: At Region Halland I built up a team of developers that initially worked with the regionhalland.se but as soon as Covid-19 broke we shifted focus to providing vaccination apps in React for our citizens and coworkers. Our app handled more than 1 million vaccinebookings and a multitude of internal tools for on demand bookings, statistics, flu-vaccines and more.

experiences.title: Head of Design Lab
experiences.description: To accelerate the digital transformation of Region Halland I was tasked with building a design lab. The lab was a team that worked with design thinking, prototyping and more to help the organization understand the digital needs of our citizens.

experiences.title: Digital Strategist
experiences.description: I made powerpoints. It was boring.

experiences.title: Lecturer
experiences.description: For a couple of years I did lectures on digital transformation for clients such as Hyperisland, the university of Halmstad, the muncipalities of Falkenberg, Varberg, Helsingborg, Halmstad and many more. All in all I did over 300 lectures.

experiences.title: Product Owner Enterprise & Search
experiences.description: As a PO I was responsible for TeliaSoneras B2B business online and our search engine. When I had time I also did a fair share of coding.

experiences.title: Creative Director
experiences.description: Modified, improved and evolved TeliaSoneras digital brand over all digital channels. Together with a bunch if brilliant people I oversaw the shift to TeliaSoneras current brand (the purple thingie)

experiences.title: Senior Prototyper & UX specialist
experiences.description: At Nokia Berlin we crafted Nokias response to the iPhone. As we all know today Nokia failed miserably but I still think we did a great job. We created the Ovi SDK which in essence was a JavaScript SDK for the phone. Perhaps 10 or so years to early.

experiences.title: Conceptual Programmer
experiences.description: I did Flash. I'm sorry. Worked mainly with brands within the  Husqvarna group and developed their global digital presence.

experiences.title: Previous assignments
experiences.company: University of Link√∂ping, Webbhuset, IT-ceum, R√∂hsska design museum et al.
experiences.description: Several different experiences. I founded IT-ceum, created exhibitions for R√∂hsska design museum, worked as a consultant for the University of Link√∂ping and much more.
